snippet: Ampon Tangnoppakul, 61, was sentenced in November to 20 years for sending text messages insulting Thailand’s monarchy.
abstract: Ampon Tangnoppakul, retired truck driver who was given a 20 year sentence for sending text messages deemed insulting to Thailand's monarchy, dies in prison.
lead_paragraph: Ampon Tangnoppakul, 61, was sentenced in November to 20 years for sending text messages insulting Thailand’s monarchy.

headline.seo: Thai Man Jailed for Insulting King Dies in Detention
headline.main: Thai Man Jailed for Insulting King Dies in Detention
headline.print_headline: Thailand: Man Convicted of Insulting Monarchy in Text Messages Dies in Jail
